definition: to get rid of/to put aside/to reject/to keep control/to hold (one's breath)

sentences.english: The Upper Reaches of Minjiang River served as ecological barriers and the major water supplying area to the Chengdu Plain.

sentences.english: Germany is bounded on two sides by natural barriers.
